ingredients module¶

class ingredients.Ingredients(ingredients)[source]¶

Bases: object

Hold information about the liquid sources

The Ingredients class is intended to be instatiated into an ingredients object whose primary function (currently) is to keep track of reagent volumes as they are used up.

configure_ingredients(ingredients_data)[source]¶

Recreate and fill ingredientsDict

ingredients_data = a dictionary of the form: {“water”: [{“container”: “source-bucket”,”location”: “A1”,”volume”: 150000}],

“wine”: [{“container”: “source-bucket”,”location”: “A2”,”volume”: 25000}]

}
